about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Kingdom of Atham, a Fantasy Survival game enriched with RPG elements! Explore a myriad of features (check the main page for details).

Exciting news: Now you can customize your light orb to reflect your style! Choose from a range of colors such as blue, red, green, and dark to enhance your appearance in seconds. Stand out from the crowd and immerse yourself even further in the fantastical realm!

This DLC includes 12 unique orbs, each with matching colors to illuminate the dark nights. From the fiery Raven to the mysterious Shadow Raven, and the ethereal Spirit Raven, the options are vast.

Package Highlights:

12 different orbs with matching colors
Enhance your aesthetic with Fire Raven, Shadow Raven, Spirit Raven, Wolf, Undead, and more!

Important Notes:
This package will receive updates and additional content throughout the exciting journey of Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions. 🌌🔮🐺

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core I5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Low Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7 9700k or AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Epic Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!
